thread.title: I'm Not Intimidated Goalkeeper Ernest Sowah
thread.title_full: I'm Not Intimidated Goalkeeper Ernest Sowah

title: I'm Not Intimidated Goalkeeper Ernest Sowah
text:
16:37 CET I'm Not Intimidated â€¦Goalkeeper Ernest Sowah By Daily Guide 
Asante Kotoko's new signing, goalkeeper Ernest Sowah, says the presence of high grade goal stoppers in the team does not intimidate him. 
Sowah, after a sojourn in DR Congo with Don Bosco, is in the country, and has put pen to paper on a three-year deal with the Porcupine Warriors. 
And responding to how he hopes to shrug off the stiff challenge from goalkeepers Isaac Amoako, Joseph Addo and Ofori Antwi, he said: 'I am not afraid of competition, in fact I am not intimidated. 
'Competition is healthy; I will keep working hard to keep the post. The names you have mentioned are equally good goalkeepers, but I will strive to maintain my form.' 
Asante Kotoko beat Hearts of Oak to the former Berekum Chelsea/Tema Youth goal stopper's signature a few days ago. 
By Kofi Owusu Aduonum
